desc: add
Append files to archive if dates have changed
extract
Extract most recent versions of files
list
List or compare external files to archive
Extract/list versions in N [4] digit directories
-force
Append files if contents have changed
Compare file contents instead of dates
Overwrite existing output files
Set the dedupe fragment size (64 2^N to 8128 2^N bytes)
Create suffix for archive indexed by F, update F
Create index F for archive
Create or access encrypted archive with password X
-method N
Compress level N (0..5 = faster..better, default 1)
Ignore/don't save file attributes or permissions
Exclude. * and ? match any string or char
Exclude. =[+-#^?] exclude by comparison result
Include only matches (default: *)
Extract to new archive F with key [X] (default: none)
-summary N
If N > 0 show brief progress
Show top N sorted by size. -1: show frag IDs
Verify but do not write files
-threads N
Use N threads (default: 0 = all cores)
Rename files... to P... or all to P/all
Roll back archive to N'th update or -N from end
Set date D, roll back (UT, default time: 235959)
